definition: confused/dizzy/giddy/to faint/to swoon/to lose consciousness/to pass out

sentences.english: Objectives To study the baroreflex function in patients with vasovagal syncope.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價血管迷走性暈厥患者的壓力反射器功能。

sentences.english: The “stunned” zombie is not allowed to tag a human for a predetermined length of time.
sentences.chinese: “暈厥”的殭屍在預定時間內不能再傳染人類。

sentences.english: Such an attack is termed syncope.
sentences.chinese: 象這樣的病我們就稱做暈厥。

sentences.english: Primary efficacy endpoints was the incidences of micturition syncope after parturition.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討提前護理干預對產後排尿性暈厥的效果。

sentences.english: Evaluation of syncope can be challenging for many reasons.
sentences.chinese: 對暈厥的診斷具有一定的挑戰性。

sentences.english: The dressing was changed to avoid excessive body position changes after the end of excessive, and prevent the occurrence of syncope.
sentences.chinese: 避免換藥結束後改變體位過快過猛，防止暈厥的發生。

sentences.english: The world of dizzy Jue, my heart is dead.
Syncope can be categorized based on the causative mechanism( See Table below).
sentences.chinese: 根據誘發機制，暈厥可以分爲幾類。

sentences.english: Most of the lovers swoon at the sight of their beloved.
sentences.chinese: 大部分的情侶在看到自己心愛的暈厥。

sentences.english: Passive head-up tilt test with and without infusion of isoproterenol was performed in the investigation and management Of 70 patients.
sentences.chinese: 提出對暈厥患者進行傾斜試驗以明確病因的方法。

sentences.english: Symptoms and complaints of the patient with syncope should be carefully considered after performing a complete history.
sentences.chinese: 採集完病史後要仔細考慮暈厥病人的主訴和症狀。

sentences.english: Patients should be cautioned to avoid situations in which syncope could result in injury.
sentences.chinese: 患者應當心避免發生暈厥而受傷情況的發生。

sentences.english: The mechanism of vasovagal syncope is complex.
sentences.chinese: 血管迷走性暈厥機制複雜。

sentences.english: Objective It is to investigate the clinical feature of the patients with neurally-mediated syncope in hospital.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討神經介導性暈厥住院患者的臨牀特點。

sentences.english: Fran gives the stunned Bud a kiss before she leaves .
sentences.chinese: 弗蘭在離去前，給已經暈厥的巴德深情一吻。

sentences.english: Methods Recall and analysis Clinical data of 26 cases of cardiogenic syncope.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顧分析26例心源性暈厥的臨牀資料。

definition: to feel sick/to feel nauseous/to feel disgusted
to faint with blurred vision (idiom); dizzy and eyes dimmed
top-heavy/fig. unbalance in organization or political structure
sharp pain/cramp/griping pain/colic/angina, cf 心絞痛|心绞痛
lit. spouting smoke through the seven orifices (idiom)/fig. to seethe with anger
